content: Now I don't know if clinically we're going to be able to drive CRs, we have some preclinical data that suggests in some context that's possible, but the way it appears to manifest itself and it's not just EGFRs, EG itâs -- we -- it appears any EGFR inhibitor, ALK inhibitors, BRAP inhibitors, you'll potentially see other potent signal transduction inhibitors later this year, you're preventing drug tolerance and therefore you're preventing -- you're delaying the onset of resistance, because you're not giving this sub population a chance to sit there and cycle and develop drug resistance.
